text: James Newton (born 1953) is an American flautist. James Newton may also refer to: *James Newton (New South Wales politician) (1850–1913) *James Newton (Tasmanian politician) (1864–1929) *James Todd Newton, American television personality (born 1970) *James William Newton, claimed to have invented the foghorn technique by using loud and low notes *James Newton (footballer) (1898–?), English footballer *James O. Newton (1882–1938), American football and basketball coach ==See also== *James Newton Howard (born 1951), American composer *Jim Newton, a main character in the TV series Fury, played by Peter Graves
title: James Newton (disambiguation)
